_header: Go little book and submit the / Unto all them
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1988)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse Printed 1476-1558. London: Mansell, 1988, TP 470.5; followed by 6115 and 860.
Subjects: epilogues; Virgin Mary, life of; envoys
_description: Epilogue to Lyf of Our Lady (4080) by William Caxton — one stanza rhyme royal

Chetham6709.First Lines:
Goo lytyll Booke and submytte theVnto all them that the shall
                    Reede…
Chetham6709.Last Lines:
…And if owghte be doon to ther plesyngSaye they these balades
                    here folowyng
